title: CELL CULTURE TECHNIQUES FOR ANIMAL CELLS
description:
Cat. I (1/6 unit)
Basic laboratory skills in mammalian cell culture to include cell counting,
freezing and thawing cell lines, culture of suspension and attached cells.
Recommended background: BB 2901, BB 2550 and knowledge of aseptic
techniques.
Concurrent or prior registration in BB 4008 is recommended.
